bibl.title: Letter from Albert G. Love to Cornelia Knox Kean, November 14, 1952 [Enclosed in 06504126]

div1.p: Love proofreads Kean's letter to the Cuban committee and suggests a spelling correction.

div1.head: Letter from Albert G. Love to Cornelia Knox Kean, November 14, 1952 [Enclosed in [06504126]
div1.p:
You flatter me very
much in allowing me to read
your letter to the Cuban Committee
I think that your letter is excellent,
and I have only one suggestion.
My dictionary includes a second
e in heroes. I am a very
poor speller and may be wrong.
Many thanks for your kind note.
